original_text: And so from this one man, and he as good as dead, came descendants as numerous as the stars in the sky and as countless as the sand on the seashore.
korean_text: 이러므로 죽은 자와 같은 한 사람으로 말미암아 하늘의 허다한 별과 또 해변의 무수한 모래와 같이 많은 후손이 생육하였느니라

sentences.original_text: And so from this one man
and he as good as dead
as numerous as the stars in the sky
and as countless as the sand on the seashore
sentences.korean_translation: 바닷가의 모래처럼 셀 수 없이 많았다
